Crab Invader

December 2021

Crab Invader

This is a game I coded.

Instructions

**You get 0.1 point for every red bullet that doesn't hit you. You get 1 point for every heart you take off the crab.

**Press space to shoot a yellow bullet at the crab. The crab has 25 lives. The spaceship has 10 lives.

**You arrows keys to move right or left. The blue block acts as a shield.

TO WIN KILL THE CRAB!! YOU CANNOT MOVE UP OR DOWN. BULLETS CANNOT GO THROUGH SHIELDS.
